tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_storage (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name STRING,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE medication_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    storage_location VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE shipment (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_date DATE,
  temperature_celsius DECIMAL,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES storage_location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_id INT,
  shipment_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  entry_time TIMESTAMP,
  exit_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medication_storage(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipment(shipment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES storage_location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TemperatureSensor (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE Medication (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  storage_temperature FLOAT,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE StorageUnit (
  unit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Alert (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  message TEXT,
  alert_time TIMESTAMP
)
